latest_revision.text:
*'''Station Champions:''' Needed
*'''Communication:''' Slack #art channel
*'''Certification:''' None
*'''Events:''' Craft Night - 1st and 3rd Monday each Month 7pm

== Overview ==
The arts and crafts cabinets are between the 3d printing and LEGO station as well as the cabinet under the 3d printing. There are more arts and craft supplies upstairs. Upstairs is limited access so someone hosting should assist if going up their is needed.

== Supplies ==
Paper cutters, pencil sharpener, laminator, canvas stretcher pliers, easels, clay sculpting tools, paintbrushes, paints, crayons, colored pencils, markers, craft sticks, pipe cleaners, fuzzy dots, magazines, stamps, paper, rolls of paper, table covers, clay, colored craft paper, and other things. 

Upstairs:
*Sketch books for watercolor; 5 boxes of them
*Foam paint brushes 1 big box of them
*Several boxes of acrylic paints
*Pallets
*Plenty of gouache
*3 boxes of 12x16 canvases
*5 boxes of 12x12 canvases
*40 easels
*Coloring markers
*Charcoal pencils and basic sketchbooks
